name: PetDrivr
description:
PetDrivr is a VR game for all the family. Drive with your pet over the town, collecting pet snacks, and their favorite toys before reaching your destination. Get help from your friends to find the exact location of the toy in the cooperative mode, or challenge them to find out who can collect more snacks!

Features


  • Meet a new exciting VR game for family and friends
  • It’s an easy game to learn, so it’s for everyone.
  • There is a cooperative mode game.
  • Collect amazing toys and snacks.
  • Drive on a big city with many areas.
